title: Binance Is 'Way Ahead of the Game' on U.S. Regulations, Says CZ
description: CZ struck out against what he said was the FUD aimed at his company amid heightened regulatory scrutiny in recent months.

title: ‘Ethereum Is Awesome', Says Solana Co-Founder Amid Planned MakerDAO Migration
description: MakerDAO’s co-founder Rune Christensen has said that Solana is a “better fit” as the basis for MakerDAO's new blockchain.

title: JP Morgan believes SEC will be forced to approve ETFs after losing case against Grayscale
description:
JP Morgan analysts led by Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou believe the SEC will be forced to approve the spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) applications submitted by multiple firms after losing its court case against Grayscale Investments, The Block reported, citing a research note. A federal court ruled that the SEC must review its rejection of Grayscale’s proposal […]

The post JP Morgan believes SEC will be forced to approve ETFs after losing case against Grayscale appeared first on CryptoSlate.
